features.featureTitle: Ensure that navigating to the /careers route from any other page scrolls the browser viewport to the top of the page. Implement a scroll-to-top effect in the CareersPage component (frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx) using a useEffect hook that calls window.scrollTo(0, 0) on mount, so the page always loads at the top regardless of scroll position on the originating page.
